0.name: dog.n.01
0.definition: a member of the genus Canis that has been domesticated by man since prehistoric times

1.name: cat.n.01
1.definition: feline mammal usually having thick soft fur and no ability to roar

2.name: animal.n.01
2.definition: a living organism characterized by voluntary movement

3.name: pet.n.01
3.definition: a domesticated animal kept for companionship or amusement

4.name: mammal.n.01
4.definition: warm-blooded vertebrate animals characterized by the production of milk in female mammary glands

5.name: canine.n.02
5.definition: any of various fissiped mammals with nonretractile claws and typically long muzzles

6.name: feline.n.01
6.definition: any of various lithe-bodied round-headed fissiped mammals, many with retractile claws

7.name: domestic_animal.n.01
7.definition: any of various animals that have been tamed and made fit for a human environment

8.name: vertebrate.n.01
8.definition: animals having a bony or cartilaginous skeleton with a segmented spinal column and a large brain

9.name: bark.v.01
9.definition: the sound made by a dog

10.name: meow.v.01
10.definition: the sound made by a cat

12.name: independent.a.01
12.definition: free from external control and constraint

13.name: companion.n.01
13.definition: a person who accompanies or associates with another

14.name: guard.v.01
14.definition: to watch over or shield from danger or harm

0.name: hypernym
0.definition: the generic term used to designate a whole class of specific instances

1.name: hyponym
1.definition: the specific term used to designate a member of a class

2.name: part_meronym
2.definition: the relation between a part and the whole

3.name: member_meronym
3.definition: the relation between a member and its group

4.name: attribute
4.definition: a quality or feature regarded as a characteristic

5.name: entailment
5.definition: the relation between a verb and the verb it entails
